webscript.description:
Post faceted-search config
http://<host>:<port>/alfresco/api/solr/facet-config
Example body to this web script:
{ "filterID" : "filter_content_size", "facetQName" : "{http://www.alfresco.org/model/content/1.0}content.size", "displayName" : "faceted-search.facet-menu.facet.size", "maxFilters" : 5, "hitThreshold" : 1, "minFilterValueLength" : 5, "sortBy" : "ALPHABETICALLY", "scope" : "SCOPED_SITES", "scopedSites" : [ "site3", "site2", "site1" ], "index" : 6, "isEnabled" : true }
Notes: - user must be an Admin, member of Alfresco_Search_Administrators group or a Network Admin for given network/tenant
